aboutUs.heading: About The Prep Pantry
aboutUs.description: The Prep Pantry is dedicated to making cooking easy and accessible. We believe that nutritious, delicious meals shouldn’t be a hassle. Our mission is to provide freshly prepared, balanced meals that fit into your busy lifestyle.

owners.name: Jane Doe - Head Chef & Nutritionist
owners.bio: With over 10 years of experience in culinary nutrition, I’m passionate about creating meals that nourish and satisfy while maintaining convenience.

owners.name: John Smith - Operations & Business Manager
owners.bio: I’ve always loved food and fitness, and I wanted to help people make healthier choices without sacrificing time or quality.

bottomSection.heading: Single Meal
bottomSection.description: Perfect for those who need an occasional, easy meal on the go. Choose from our menu.

bottomSection.heading: Bulk Meal
bottomSection.description: Save money and plan ahead with our bulk meal options. Choose any 5 meals from our menu.

bottomSection.heading: Subscription
bottomSection.description: Enjoy hassle-free meal prep with 20 meals per month, customized to your preferences.
